Best Answer: Kayla is a female given name, meaning pure in Greek, beloved in Gaelic, wise child in Arabic, crown of laurels in Latin, and full of joy in Hebrew. Relevance. Rating Newest Oldest. Best Answer: Kayla is a female given name, meaning pure in Greek, beloved in Gaelic, wise child in Arabic, crown of laurels in Latin, and full of joy in Hebrew. Variants include Kaela, Kaila, and Cayla.

Meaning of Kayla. Irish name. In Irish, the name Kayla means-pure and beloved. Other origins for the name Kayla include-Irish, English, African-American.The name Kayla is most often used as a girl name or female name. Irish Name Meaning-pure and beloved.

Kayla /kay-la/ [2 sylls.] as a girls' name is pronounced KAY-la. It is of Irish and Gaelic origin, and the meaning of Kayla is slim and fair . From Caoilainn. Also used as a modern variant of Kayley and Katherine, or as a diminutive of Michaela. Also possibly from the Yiddish name Kelila, meaning  crown of laurel . Initial popularity of the name is due to the character named Kayla on the daytime TV drama Days of Our Lives.
